fields.Title: APT / MAZOV DOOR
fields.Description:
DOOR, APARTMENT #11 (turns into door. can lockpick and get into?)

1. Use the wirecutters to cut the chain.
If you don't have them, the door suggests it. The chain is very flimsy. 
Exactly the same structure as other doors. 

1. Observe the padlock. - the weakness here is in chain.

Option to get a task if you do not have the chaincutters.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why would we want to break into so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would we want to break into some random citizen's apartment?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's so much he could say right..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's so much he could say right now, but he knows it wouldn't make much of a difference.

fields.Title: You: ""Why *wouldn't* we want to?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why *wouldn't* we want to?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I believe it's the *shackle* you m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe it's the *shackle* you mean to cut, detective." The lieutenant points to the corroded loop with a gloved finger.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's just trying to help, don't tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's just trying to help, don't take it... bad. Relax.

fields.Title: You: "Use the chaincutters to cut through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Use the chaincutters to cut through the padlock.

fields.Title: You: ""Time for a little snip-snip!" (Do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Time for a little snip-snip!" (Do hand-scissors.)

fields.Title: Interfacing: "A lock blocks your path! You might..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A lock blocks your path! You might have use for one of those standard police devices for cutting chains. Something that may be found in an RCM motor carriage...

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know, just seems like some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, just seems like something we could do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You seem committed to it, so go on.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem committed to it, so go on."

fields.Title: You: ""We could use some chaincutters her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could use some chaincutters here to cut the shackle."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["apt.padlock_examined"]  and  IsKimHere()  and  CheckItem("chaincutters") == false  and  CheckEquipped("chaincutters") == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't say a word,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't say a word, his face wiped clear of any emotion.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The shackle snaps like a twig and t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shackle snaps like a twig and the lock falls to the floor with a little thud. It should be possible to enter now...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps you should give it another..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps you should give it another go?"

fields.Title: Padlocked Door: "This door has been closed with a pa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This door has been closed with a padlock. A chalk-drawn number on the board says #11.

fields.Title: Padlocked Door: "No reply."
fields.Dialogue Text: No reply.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you for a l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at you for a long moment, then blinks once...

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After you, detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "After you, detective."

fields.Title: You: ""Snip-snip, my friend!" (Do hand-sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Snip-snip, my friend!" (Do hand-scissors.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes a closer look at the lock...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes a closer look at the lock. "I supposed if one were *committed* to it, there's a pair of chaincutters in the Kineema."

fields.Title: You: "Examine the padlock."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the padlock.

fields.Title: You: ""Don't you think that's what I'm *t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't you think that's what I'm *trying* to do?"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "What are you doing? You need to get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you doing? You need to get your tools out, man.

fields.Title: You: "Knock."
fields.Dialogue Text: Knock.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Yes! Get those cutters in there and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes! Get those cutters in there and *snip* away. This weak chain is no match for your might.

fields.Title: Padlocked Door: "It's a solid lump of metal, but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a solid lump of metal, but the shackle is deeply corroded -- a solid pair of chaincutters would make short work of it.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "What are you doing? You're trying t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you doing? You're trying to cut the body of the lock with the chaincutters and it's really not working.

fields.Title: You: "Refrain from commenting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Refrain from commenting.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is concentrated on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is concentrated on the hallway, scanning both ways for any approachers.

fields.Title: You: ""These chaincutters are broken, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "These chaincutters are broken, Kim."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Better whip out those cutters... yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Better whip out those cutters... you won't get very far otherwise.
